reviewText: Was a very good series, worth watching! Great cast, Michael J Fox returns for a few episodes. Recommended if you enjoy Charlie sheen.
If you miss Charlie Sheen ref. 2 1/2 Men, you might want to buy Spin City , that same persona that made Men good comes through in SC
It was funny for the time it was made. It's too bad they didn't have a better ending for the last season.

It's the sixth and final season of the show and it's finally out to complete our collection. It's the same usual bare-bones release like the others. Just the episodes, no bonuses or anything like that.
The sixth season was aired in 720p. And it would have been so good if these dvds were in widescreen but they aren't. Instead, it's in full frame. If they released a blu-ray or even a widescreen version of the sixth season, I would be all over that. I would buy those in a heart beat.
Shipped fast.  It was great to see Michael J. Fox for the first three episodes.

Spin City has been one of my favorite TV shows for years. I was disappointed that Charlie Sheen and Heather Locklear took over the show, but compared to their predecessor, they did a formidable job. Overall this season was alright. The series finale was one of the poorest finales I have ever seen. It gave no real ending to the show.
awesome final season. it would have been nice to have some more seasons of this show but thats what happens when alot of people like the show, it just ends up stopping
Arrived quickly and exactly as described!!! Great seller!!! A+A+A+A+A+
Great show.  What can you say about Charlie sheen?  He is great and so is heather.  Funny show.  Watch it.
